pages.text:
Private Events
Wild West in Hudson Oaks, TX
Have a large group you would like to bring out to the park?
We host family reunions, organization appreciation events, girl scout and boy scout troops, and
much more.
Booking Info
Splash into Savings with Exclusive Group Packages
For school bookings, please email us at
info@skparks.com
.
Please Note:
Private Events are available anytime outside of public operating hours within the
operating season
.
Private Events start at $1,600/hr +Taxes & Fees with a minimum 2-hour reservation.
Advance reservation required. Subject to availability.
Private Events include a two (2) hour park rental with up to 500 guests.
(e.g., Full Park Private Event (2 hrs. & 500 guests) = $3,200.00)
Additional Hours
$1,600
/hr
Additional Guests
$7
/guest
Meal Vouchers
$14.95
/voucher
Unlimited Drink Wristbands
$10
/wristband
Lighting Fee (Events ending after 8:30pm)
$500
Ready to make a splash with your private event? Fill out the form on this page and we’ll get you started!
Request a Private Event
Fill out the form below to request a private event and one of our team members will get in touch shortly.
First Name
Last Name
Email Address
Phone Number
How many guests?
What date do you want to reserve?
Message
Submit
Requirements and Policies
A 50% deposit (based on estimated cost) is due at time reservation is made. Final cost will be determined upon your groups arrival.
Balance due will be paid upon check-in. The deposit is fully refundable sixty (60) days prior to the event; 50% refundable thirty (30) days prior to the event; and non-refundable less than 30 days prior to the event.
Events ending after 8:30 pm will incur a $500 lighting fee.
Inclement Weather
In the event that inclement weather prevents the park from hosting your event, Splash Kingdom will work with your
group to reschedule the event or provide a full refund of the amount paid. If inclement weather causes the park to close prior to completing at least 75% of the scheduled time of your event, Splash Kingdom will choose from the following options in order to accommodate your group:
(a) Prorate the total cost of the event accordingly or
(b) reactivate group tickets to be used anytime during the current season.
Birthdays
Splash Bash Birthday Parties are an exciting way to celebrate your child’s birthday.
You provide the guests and we provide the fun!
Sit back, relax, and let us handle everything.
Group Events
Have a large group you would like to bring out to the park?
We host family reunions, organization appreciation events, girl scout and boy scout troops, and much more.
Need Admission?
Check out our Admission Options
General Admission, Twilight Tickets, Bundles, and more... Click the link below to view all our Admission Options!
View All Admission Options

.

Private Events are available anytime outside of public operating hours within the
operating season
.
Private Events start at $2,100/hr +Taxes & Fees with a minimum 2-hour reservation.
Advance reservation required. Subject to availability.
Private Events include a two (2) hour park rental with up to 500 guests.
(e.g., Full Park Private Event (2 hrs. & 500 guests) = $4,200.00)

A 50% deposit (based on estimated cost) is due at time reservation is made. Final cost will be determined upon your groups arrival.
Balance due will be paid upon check-in. The deposit is fully refundable sixty (60) days prior to the event; 50% refundable thirty (30) days prior to the event; and non-refundable less than 30 days prior to the event.
Events ending after 8:30 pm will incur a $500 lighting fee.

Park Hours & Events
Wild West in Hudson Oaks, TX
Explore all the happenings at Splash Kingdom Wild West!
2025 Season:
May 24th – September 1, 2025
Operating Hours:
Sunday-Thursday: 11am-6pm
Friday-Saturday: 11am-7pm
*Park hours subject to change.
Follow us on Facebook for the latest updates
(817) 598-0777
info@skparks.com
1001 Cinema Drive
Weatherford, TX 76087
Please Note:
The calendar below is NOT updated for closure due to bad weather. For updated hours on bad weather days, please follow our
Facebook page.

Unlimited Fun all Season
Gain Admission all Summer with a Season Pass
Experience a summer of excitement with our 2024 Season Passes! Whether you're a thrill-seeker or looking for a relaxing day by the pool, our season passes offer something for everyone. Don't miss out on the fun – grab your season pass today and make memories that last a lifetime!
2024 Season Passes

Group Events
Timber Falls in Nacogdoches, TX
Have a large group you would like to bring out to the park?
We host family reunions, organization appreciation events, girl scout and boy scout troops, and
much more.
Group Rates
Splash into Savings with Exclusive Group Packages
Group Rates start at
15 or more guests
at $22.95/ea +Taxes & Fees and are available during
normal operating hours.
*Requires at least a three (3) day advance reservation with a 50% deposit.
Pricing:
15-30 Guests: $17.95 +Taxes & Fees
31-100 Guests: $16.95 +Taxes & Fees
101-200 Guests: $15.95 +Taxes & Fees
201-300 Guests: $14.95 +Taxes & Fees
301+ Guests: $13.95 +Taxes & Fees
Bonus:
Receive 1 free ticket for every 30 guests!
Add-ons
Meal Vouchers
$14.95
/voucher
Unlimited Drink Wristbands
$10
/wristband
Shaded Pavillion
$200
Have questions? Need more information? Ready to make a reservation? Fill out the form on this page and we’ll get your group event started with a splash!
Request Group Reservation
Fill out the form below to request a group reservation and one of our team members will get in touch shortly.
First Name
Last Name
Email Address
Phone Number
How many guests?
What date do you want to reserve?
Message
Submit
Requirements and Policies
A 50% deposit (based on estimated cost) is due at time reservation is made. Final cost will be determined upon your groups arrival.
Balance due will be paid upon check-in. The deposit is fully refundable sixty (60) days prior to the event; 50% refundable thirty (30) days prior to the event; and non-refundable less than 30 days prior to the event.
Events ending after 8:30 pm will incur a $500 lighting fee.
Inclement Weather
In the event that inclement weather prevents the park from hosting your event, Splash Kingdom will work with your
group to reschedule the event or provide a full refund of the amount paid. If inclement weather causes the park to close prior to completing at least 75% of the scheduled time of your event, Splash Kingdom will choose from the following options in order to accommodate your group:
(a) Prorate the total cost of the event accordingly or
(b) reactivate group tickets to be used anytime during the current season.
Chaperone Tickets
For every 30 Group tickets purchased, Splash Kingdom will provide one (1) FREE chaperone ticket.
Each guest wishing to enter the park must have a ticket, including guests not wishing to swim.
Birthdays
Splash Bash Birthday Parties are an exciting way to celebrate your child’s birthday.
You provide the guests and we provide the fun!
Sit back, relax, and let us handle everything.
Private Events
Reserving the entire Splash Kingdom Park
is a great way for your church, company, sports team, or group to have one of the best events ever.
Need Admission?
Check out our Admission Options
General Admission, Twilight Tickets, Bundles, and more... Click the link below to view all our Admission Options!
View All Admission Options

Private Events include a two (2) hour park rental with up to 500 guests.
(e.g., Full Park Private Event (2 hrs. & 500 guests) = $2,800.00)

Ready to make a splash with your private event? Fill out the form on this page and we’ll get you started!
Request a Private Event
Fill out the form below to request a private event and one of our team members will get in touch shortly.
First Name

How many guests?
What date do you want to reserve?
Message
Submit
Requirements and Policies
A 50% deposit (based on estimated cost) is due at time reservation is made. Final cost will be determined upon your groups arrival.
Balance due will be paid upon check-in. The deposit is fully refundable sixty (60) days prior to the event; 50% refundable thirty (30) days prior to the event; and non-refundable less than 30 days prior to the event.
Events ending after 8:30 pm will incur a $500 lighting fee.
Inclement Weather
In the event that inclement weather prevents the park from hosting your event, Splash Kingdom will work with your
group to reschedule the event or provide a full refund of the amount paid. If inclement weather causes the park to close prior to completing at least 75% of the scheduled time of your event, Splash Kingdom will choose from the following options in order to accommodate your group:
(a) Prorate the total cost of the event accordingly or
(b) reactivate group tickets to be used anytime during the current season.
Birthdays
Splash Bash Birthday Parties are an exciting way to celebrate your child’s birthday.
You provide the guests and we provide the fun!
Sit back, relax, and let us handle everything.
